name: Urban Linker
tag_list: recruitment, head-hunting, developper, digital, web, paris
overview:
URBAN LINKER is first and foremost a inovative concept in recruitment and headhunting, specializing in professions of the Web. When we created our business model, we analyzed and reworked all the tasks in recruitment that are essential to identifying the best candidate in order to create a process that reflects today’s world of business and the new way of thinking. Beyond recruitment, we provide consulting services, nurture start-ups, and organize web events – making us true players in the 2.0 world.

Our strength : A disruptive image on the recruitment/HR market which is accord with Startups & innovation sector. A strong community of clients, candidates and ambassadors.

Our development level : A team of 12 consultants. Partnerships with biggest digital actors in France. A leader role in recruitment service for startup market.
